data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.Description
data.value: Expose textbox related events. Please visit www.w3schools.com/jsref/dom_obj_event.asp for browser compatibilities.

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onBlur.Description
data.value: Script execution when a user leaves field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onChange.Description
data.value: Script execution when a user changes value of the selected field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onCopy.Description
data.value: Script execution when copying some texts from the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onClick.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field is clicked:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.ondblClick.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field is double-clicked:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onCut.Description
data.value: Script execution when cutting some texts from the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onFocus.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field gets focus:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onFocusIn.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field is about to get focus:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onFocusOut.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field is about to lose focus:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onInput.Description
data.value: Script execution when the field is about to lose focus:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onKeyDown.Description
data.value: Script to be executed once key is down:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onKeyUp.Description
data.value: Script to be executed once key is down:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onKeyPress.Description
data.value: Script to be executed once key is pressed:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseDown.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when pressing a mouse button over the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseEnter.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when moving the mouse pointer onto the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseLeave.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when moving the mouse pointer out of the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseMove.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when moving the mouse pointer over the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseOver.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when moving the mouse pointer onto the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseOut.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when moving the mouse pointer out of the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onMouseUp.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when releasing a mouse button over the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onPaste.Description
data.value: Script to be executed when pasting some texts in the field:

data.name: MuhammetAtalay.XRM.PCF.ExposeInputEvents.Field.onSelect.Description
data.value: Script to be executed after some texts has been selected in the field:

data.value: Script to be executed When the user rolls the mouse wheel over the field:
